name: Debbie Dobbins
offering: Business Coaching, Business Consulting, Client-Attracting Book Coach, Client-Attracting Book Writing, Coach Marketing Training, Coach Promotion, Content Creation, Financial Coaches, Group Coaching, Intuition Coaching, Marketing Coach, Mastermind Groups, Podcast Host, Presentation Skills, Public Speaking, Retreat Centers, Sales Training, Speaker Training, Spiritual Coaching, Startup Coaches
what_you_do: Dreamvisions 7 Radio Network is a syndicated holistic radio network that aims to make a difference in people's lives by offering various programs and modalities to bring awareness, joy, and love to listeners.
who_you_serve: The network serves a diverse audience interested in holistic health and wellness, including individuals seeking personal growth and community engagement.
signature_programs: Monthly book giveaways and newsletter sign-ups for special offers.
current_projects: Monthly book giveaways and newsletter sign-ups for special offers.
bio: Founded in 2007 by Deborah Beauvais, the network has partnerships with various syndication platforms including TuneIn, Roku, iHeart Radio, and more.
business_focus: Dreamvisions 7 Radio Network is a syndicated holistic radio network that aims to make a difference in people's lives by offering various programs and modalities to bring awareness, joy, and love to listeners.
